reviews.review_text: Always loved their Fried Tom Yum Noodles, they used to have it on their set menu, and lately the rising of cost they had to remove them from the lunch set, I would still order it as a main lunch and packed half of the portion for my dinner. It s still Delicious and affordable could still separate it in 2 meals. I would still order this menu.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Shalini, your positive review made our day here at Thai Away Home! Were thrilled that you enjoyed our authentic Thai food and top-notch service. We look forward to serving you again, and we encourage you to spread the word to your friends so they can experience the same delicious flavors!

reviews.review_text: I have tried mani times the good from this place and always is a good option,  now they have a all you can eat version, that means you can try different options at the same time. If you are looking for good Thai food this is the place
All you can eat special is an incredible idea, and I hope it comes back again! Love being able to try everything and then get a little more of what I enjoyed. Thank you!
Had the Tom Ka Gai and it was delicious! Great portion size. Fresh veggies and chicken. Highly recommend!
I always love their pad thai and the chicken cashew. They serve good portions too. Always get their thai iced tea! Parking: Lots of parking spot downstairs
Good food, good price, very nice service
Good food good price very nice service

Thai Away Home is an absolute gem in Vancouvers culinary scene! When I step inside after an intense gym session, it feels like Im being transported straight back to the bustling streets of Thailand. The aroma alone is a tantalizing journey for the senses. But what truly sets this place apart is their incredible all-you-can-eat promotion at their new location. Its a flavor explosion that I cant get enough of, and I leave feeling like a Thai food connoisseur. Claire, one of the servers, is a true magician when it comes to providing service. Her attentiveness and warmth make the dining experience truly exceptional. I cant wait to return just to be in her capable hands again. In conclusion, if youre seeking the best Thai food in Vancouver, look no further than Thai Away Home. Its not just a meal; its a culinary adventure that will whisk you away to the heart of Thailand. Im already counting down the moments until my next visit.
We have been here for many times already, and we usually order Pad Thai and Pad Si Ew, and we always left with satisfaction! We will come back for sure!

This place is a hidden gem! The food is restaurant quality. Best green curry I ve ever had. Amazing quality, and I believe I have eaten at one of their restaurant locations in the past. Also the staff is incredibly kind and the location is very clean. Quite dangerous because we will be here all the time! :) maybe we will balance it out with some gym hehe. Keep it up guys.
Food is always good, fast service and friendly staff. They also have an all you can eat buffet if really hungry. Vegetarian options: Tofu is good
Amazing all you can eat Thai food at city square mall just $15.65!!! I would come back again for sure. The taste was so good!!
Great thai food! Super yummy and quick service!!
they offered me for all you can eat that it s good deal ! I really love this place

Love this place for lunch! Their lunch menu is is stellar with reasonable prices. They also have a  help yourself  sauce section on the counter. I love loading up my curry with some spiciness! Recommended to order ahead; especially during the lunch rush!
I love to come here for All You Can Eat at lunch. Tasty Thai food and good value. Vegetarian options: Vegan friendly
Good food and good service NON is very nice . I like the all you can eat take away..
Amazing people and food was amazing:) definitely try there all you can eat next time !!
Great food for a food court, really fresh and tasty! Had an all you can eat situation and it didnt disappoint. Nice service from nicer people... Cannot go wrong here

Love this place!! The most authentic in all of Vancouver. DELICIOUS chicken wings, fried rice, pad kee mao, garlic prawns...Ive enjoyed everything Ive tried. Wonderful, friendly people too! I always get extra spicy and they get it just right
Been here number of times.  My whole family likes the Pad Thai here. Parking: Easy Kid-friendliness: Kids enjoy the Pad Thai
Very good ice tea. Love it! Come and try!
They recently opened a buffet style option with AYCE and 1 or 2 item style option. Its really great for the price and the food is quality. Love tasting each dish. :)
The pad Thai is 10/10 here; tastes just like Thailand . I m glad they opened a new location (city square) closer to the sky train as I use to frequent the Cambie location.
Super friendly staff.  Iced Thai coffee was delicious!
As a frequent customer, I highly recommend this place for their tasteful food, friendly customer service, reasonable prices and a good menu! You can t go wrong with this place.

This place has the most reasonable Thai food in a food court setting. Delicious, portion is big, and good service. I also get their pad thai or pad si ew. They also have an All You Can Eat deal from 10am-3pm on almost everyday except for Sunday.
All you can eat thai food for lunch Must try !!! Food
Drinks and food were very good! Right now there is a promotion for all you can eat. All you can eat from 11:30am-3:00pm from Monday to Saturday for $15.65.

the staff was very welcoming and nice, i could smell the delicouse food when i entered to the food court and the taste was even better than the smell. the country fried chicken was so crispy and juicey!
Work at VGH, pretty much order here every time. Cool staff, quality food. All you can eat promo happening now.
So excited to try ayce Thai!!

They have an all you can eat option from 11-3 at a price I almost never see anymore that included green curry, pad thai, spring rolls, veg,  spicy chicken and a beef stirfry.  There arent a lot of items available, but theyre all good. The green curry on rice was my favorite. Having a buffet in a food court is a bit odd, but I went at 2 and there were no issues in finding a seat closeby, and it wasnt crowded. I told them I was ready, and they had no problems filling the plate with my requests.  The plate was square, and about half the size of the tray.  Every time you go back, you throw away the paper plate, and you get a new tray and new plate. Two full plates was more than enough for me, and I have a big appetite. If youre ok with not a ton of variety for an AYCE, and like Thai food, then you need to try this at least once.  And I first thought it was a bit odd, but I actually liked the food court setting.  The people were very nice and accommodating in giving you as much as you want.  The whole thing was very nice and low stress. Parking: Free 2 hour parking with store purchase.  Not sure if there is minimum requirement.  There is a dollar store in the mall.
Great food ! They have this all you can eat promoting Monday to sat now and you can have unlimited padThai and red chicken curry . Will definitely go back for lunch again .
Great experience!! Very sweet people, I will definitely be coming back. Food and drinks are absolutely delicious! I DEFINITELY recommend:)
Friendly staffs as always. I would love to come back again definitely for lunch special and all you can eat, also i love fried chicken and chicken wing!! Recommended
I ordered the Pad Si Ew with chicken for lunch and it was delicious! It was a good portion for lunch and you get a tasty spring roll as part of the combo.
Excellent food. I tried multiple item, its all good in taste. Food served warm and clean.
Had a nice all you can eat promotion  for a reasonable price. Friendly staff and tasty looking food
Love the food here. Excellent service. Must try all you can eat :)
It was great, the place is good. And the services is awesome. What about the food its very good for a tottally decent price. Thanks the team
Very friendly staff, great food for the value. Our kids love the pad Thai and chicken wings. It is our regular lunch spot during the weekend
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Rachel,  were honored by your positive feedback! Thank you for choosing Thai Away Home, and for your kind words. We hope to have the pleasure of serving you again soon.

reviews.review_text: It was pleasant they have an all you can eat special which is surprising. Great place. Parking: None
Great food. Very friendly. Will definately return again at future visits.
I always enjoy my meal from here! Very tasty
Fast and delicious! I regularly call to order and its ready for pickup in 10-15mins. Good curries and fried rice. Vegetarian options: Nearly every main can come with tofu instead of meat.
I really love their Chicken Pad Thai! They have eat all you can during lunch time which is a good deal too.
Great restaurant. All location are good. Prices are good and has a great lunch deal
They have a nice all you can eat special. Reasonably priced. Thanks
The best Thai food in Vancouver. The food is so good and priced right. I will definitely come back here again. The service is amazing as well.
This is some of the best affordable Thai in the city. And the mall food court is actually quite pleasant. This is a hidden gem.
Super yummy and quick service! Great thai food in a very central area.
Always super fresh food and friendly staff! Pad si ew is always my go to. :)
The service was amazing. Very helpful in answering questions and of course the food was great!
Great service. I got the all you can eat. Recommend
Very friendly staff, definitely gonna try all you can eat next time
The food is amazing! And the servers are very nice!

Tom Ka Gai soup served hot, little creamy and very tasty, lemongrass and coconut milk smell very good, come with four fresh prawns   for $10. Good food court price with resturant quality. Will come again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Miffy! We re glad that you liked our food. Hope to see you again

reviews.review_text: One of my favourite Thai places! Their Pad Si Ew is probably the best dish
Very friendly cashier and delicious food with good price
Great food and service!
Such friendly staff!! Quick and yummy food to grab on a fast lunch break!
Great Selection. Great Food. Great Price.
Great food and service! Love the eggplant basil stir fry. Vegetarian options: Great selection Food : 5/5 |
Friendly service and good food! And the food court is not too crowded and clean.
Great customer service. Amazing food. Keep it up
Great staff! Always come here for lunch. Worth it : )
Very tasty Pad Thai and Thai Ice Tea.
So good! Great lunch place. Krap koon krub
Good food... and amazing taste must visit with friends and family
Great service and amazing food! Friendly people
Very friendly and food is very affordable and food
Very good and authentic Thai food you can find here Kid-friendliness: Very nice Food : 5/5 |
Food is always good as usual. Service is top notch. Thank you! Parking: Parking is reimbursed if you buy something. Food : 5/5 |
Delicious food, especially pad Thai! Always friendly service.
I like the food here and service is always superb!
Excellent food and service. Would recommend!!!
Service is excellent.  Food was great.   Overall excellence
Love this little place tucked away. Shhh it s our secret
Good curry and its all made fresh! Always a line but it moves pretty quickly.
Great place with really affordable prices! Super easy to get to as well!
Love this place! Good food and great service!
One of the best Thai food in town hidden tucked away in a tiny mall! Pad Thai here is legit! Food : 5/5
Freshly made  and not oily crispy wonton. Would appreciate a little more filling in it.
Nice service, will come back
I ordered Pad Si Ew and it is delicious, I really enjoy eating there.
I love Thai Away! Best Thai Food I ve had since coming to Vancouver
Great flavours, recommend the pad Thai and pad si ew!

Really like the Thai coconut chicken soup (tom Kha Gai if I recalled correctly). Ordered as a takeout and everything tastes great except a bit salty for me but my boyfriend loves it. We pretty happy with that they can make whatever in their menu tasty.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Zhixuan. We re glad you had a good experience with us. Hope to see you again

reviews.review_text: One of my regular go-to spots for Thai food. Great staff, great food :)
Nice food and price!
One of my favourite Thai places in Vancouver, really authentic and affordable value.

I have been looking for really excellent Thai food since moving to Vancouver a year and a half ago and omg, this is it. Its quickly become my go to for delivery and my choice for all special occasions. Such delicious food, good prices, and they are great about doing things vegan friendly. Cannot recommend enough. Whatever location you go to or order from, do it now! You wont regret it.
good food and reasonable price :) one of the few good options for Thai food in the area
It s my first time trying Thai Away Home, and the service was amazing. Thank you.
Very friendly staff! And the food was very yummy
I come here often and the food is nice and not expensive
Super friendly good customer service and good food
Worth going to. Excellent food and service.
Great meal! Very large portions, all fresh and tasty
